website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for those looking for an inexpensive model with easy-breezy installation.
pros: Earns top marks for being whisper quiet
Large size helps cool down even larger rooms
Two drops sizes means it can work in rooms with low or high ceilings
cons: Universal remote must be purchased separately

website_summaries.verdict: The best value for your money. A reliable, high-quality fan that won't break the bank. Has a legion of satisfied customers.
pros: Easy to fit, very quiet, and extremely affordable with three mounting options
cons: Doesn't come with a remote, but compatible units are available

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a year and a half, then the pulley on the light broke. The mechanism within the light switch itself is unnecessarily complicated and difficult to replace, unlike every other ceiling fan I've seen. Instead of a matter of stripping wires and connecting those together, the copper connectors require welding. Regardless, this fan should have lasted longer than a year and a half without needing any kind of replacement. I'm not happy with this purchase and won't buy another Hunter fan.
customer_reviews.author: Azure

customer_reviews.title: Purchased in July, Installed in September, Stopped Working in March
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these fans. One in May for our living room. Works great! Quiet, easy to install and it looks really nice. So bought a second one in July for our master bedroom and we had it installed in Sept. Went to turn it on and the light bulb wouldn't work but the fan did. We put new bulbs in...nothing....about 5 days later we went to turn on the fan and nothing. We had an electrician check the wiring and everything is fine. Sucks because we really like the fan :(
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Wish I hadn’t bought and installed 5 of them
customer_reviews.text: Where to start? Their high speed setting is slower than I would expect for a fan of its size. I’ve had to replace three pull chain switches for the fan side so far since they’ve gone bad (won’t click anymore). I’ve had two glass globes shatter from the pull chains accidentally hitting them (thanks kids). Their motors make little annoying sounds sometimes on lower speeds. Do yourself a favor and check this out in person before buying it. Or shop around for something a little more expensive (but higher quality).
customer_reviews.author: N. Head

customer_reviews.title: Works with dimmer switch
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. We had to purchase 2 for our addition. We had the added complication of vaulted ceilings which required a downbar and our electrician pre installed dimmer switches already. These look beautiful. They are a dark brown with almost black metal parts. We went with the 18 inch down bar and they worked with the switches. Assembly took 2 hours for both fans. There's also a metal , Hunter, plate in case you would opt for no light, just the fan. The fan globe is a nice suntan, bronze color. The switches worked well. Great produce and much cheaper than big box home improvement stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: A quiet, attractive Hunter fan
customer_reviews.text: This 52" fan is perfect in our bedroom. We, however, did not want a remote control as I had heard bad things about the durability, so this model does not have that feature. It is a dark brown and is very attractive. It is also extremely quiet. The installation was fairly easy but I would caution anyone doing so to cover the top of the motor openings as you are installing the canopy. It would be very easy to have one of the screws fall into the motor openings. It almost happened to me. Just wrap a hand towel around the motor openings as you are screwing in the canopy.
customer_reviews.author: Don Lohrey

customer_reviews.title: Very good product...
customer_reviews.text: We have a number of older ceiling fans that are of this one brand that are still working like champs. The only non-Hunter fan we had installed failed, so our choice obviously was to replace it with a Hunter model. Done, and everything is back to normal. Will only use Hunter fans from now on (we are talking about existing and still reliable fans that are 15-20 years old and used 300 days a year.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wylie

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty. I bought a 12 inch extension for my vaulted ceiling and switched out the gold globe with a white one. Looks much better and much brighter light. I also changed out bulbs for 60 watt LED. What I don't like about it is that the highest speed is only as fast as the medium speed on all my other ceiling fans. It is quiet and moves air much better with the extension.
customer_reviews.author: Pugs2

customer_reviews.title: Overall a Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy as they say to put it together. Some of that was my older home, and some of that was missing pieces. Fortunately, they do include limited spare hardware. Some holes didn't line up properly, though, and at one point just had to be given up on (thankfully a cosmetic feature, not a structural one!). Also, the pull chain for the fan came broken (the interior piece was broken and the chain just slid through it). Overall, a nice fan for the price. Once you get it installed, it's quiet and efficient, and it gives you a very nice breeze. I would definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Meh

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: Too many things went wrong with my Hunter Ceiling Fan that had a remote control that would have cost me almost as much as the fan was worth. So I opted for another Hunter with NO Remote. Only problem was that the installation was on a cathedral ceiling and the pull chains were not long enough. Simple remedy by adding more chain. The install was easy as this was a replacement and of the same brand. I'll stick with Hunter, even though the last fan crapped out on me.
customer_reviews.author: George A. Franke

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and wobble free
customer_reviews.text: I have installed two of these so far and they look and operate great. They are not quite the easiest fan I have installed but overall they are fairly simple. Fan moves nice air in a bedroom on high speed and the light is adequate and nice. Don't expect anything but good lighting for a small room from this light kit. If you need the light to light up a bigger room I would suggest something else. Overall the fans have been absolutely quiet and wobble free from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron C

customer_reviews.title: Hunter fans are great but...
customer_reviews.text: I've installed dozens of fans, all different name brands. I love Hunter fans because they are quiet, efficient and normally easy to install. This particular fan had screw holes that were way out of alignment and made installation a very frustrating deal. It took me about 3 times the average because nothing lined up correctly. Hunter fans are very high quality and it really surprised me that the machining was way off. 'Nuff said about that, the fan is working very well as expected, very quiet as expected and very well balanced even at high speed. It will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Good Fan with nice air flow for a kids room
customer_reviews.text: This fan was excellent for the loft and kids bedroom. It provides enough airflow to keep you cool. I have installed 3 of these in my house, also installed the Alexa enabled remotes(Best thing i have done. The bulbs that come with the fan provide enough light. Every one in my house is happy. Bought the first one on Amazon the rest of the two from Lowes as they had sale going on the following week. Over all you will not repent with the performance. The customer would be really happy if the price is $199 instead of $129.
customer_reviews.author: TigerVas

customer_reviews.title: Good fan, good lighting.
customer_reviews.text: We needed more light in the bedroom. I was worried when I saw the light online that it may not do what we needed. We installed it and it gives plenty of light. It is a soft light, not that bright blinding light you see on most fan lights. I used this fan to replace a fan that didn't have lights. I moved the lightless fan to another place in the house where I didn't need extra light.n The bulbs are the opera small base bulbs. I found energy efficient bulbs [2] and replaced the standard bulbs. It takes [2] 60 watt bulbs. The fan is quiet and works well. The replacement install was quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Pilotcop

customer_reviews.title: DOA Fan
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Hunter fan and scheduled my electrician to come out and install it. When he unboxed the brand new unit, it had a loose bolt floating around in the enclosed fan motor housing with no way to get to it...Great QC...NOT... I had to incur additional cost to install a new NON HUNTER BRAND fan...In 2019 there should not be a body floating around in the fan motor casing...QC should of caught this. Plus the unit had only 2 small bulbs that would not of given off much light. PASS ON THIS FAN....
customer_reviews.author: David Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great fan. Very dim light
customer_reviews.text: The fan lives up to Hunters reputation. It was balanced right out of the box. You cannot hear it running except at the highest speed. Even then, the air movement is louder than the actual fan. The only reason I am giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is that the light is extremely dim. I have this in my bedroom and the light level is great if you need to get up in the middle of the night or want mood lighting, but that's about it. I paired it with the Hunter 99122 remote without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: M. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Pain to install no remote
customer_reviews.text: There was not a remote control for this unit. Fans are usually easy to install however you’d be more likely to get a child to sit still during a five hour church mass than get this fan installed. I had to call in reinforcements to help and I fix everything myself! I had a remote in my old Fan and it was not easy to install (this does not come with a remote). I had to replace my last hunter fan due to a bad motor, which was surprising because it was only 5 years old. I thought buying the same fan would make it easier.. and it did not
customer_reviews.author: Prime Time

customer_reviews.title: good for low ceilings and relatively short people
customer_reviews.text: I am a 5' 7" male and have installed several on 7' ceiling rooms in my house in the last three years. 7' is as high as I can reach flat-footed. If you use the short extension conduit provided, the lowest blade distance from the ceiling is 11 1/2 ", and the bottom of the globe is 17" from the ceiling. So at my height I can't run into turning blades, but I can run into the globe if I walk directly underneath. In my case I can't walk directly underneath due to furniture obstacles. Hope this helps. Just beware of getting out of bed and streching.
customer_reviews.author: KMH

customer_reviews.title: im a fan
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of this fan. Quiet fan that is easy to install. I had to add an extra down-pole to mount it to my high ceiling. No noise whatsoever. My wife doesn't like it because she says the fan blades get dusty quicker. I think this is probably true since it moves more air. Also be care when you tighten the glass housing. I got it too tight and cracked the glass.
customer_reviews.author: John Coltrane

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I like that the fan has a remote control and it is very quite. What I don't like is you can't feel the fan it's not strong at all. My ceiling is not high it's about 8 ft. in order to feel the fan you have to stand right under it. If you put a sheet of paper on the table right under it the paper stay in one place you don't have to worry about it blowing away that's how weak the fan is on high speed.
customer_reviews.author: Rainey Day Travel

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I came home from work to find my ceiling fan In pieces as it came off my ceiling and was shattered into pieces. I cannot believe a product could do this I bought two the other one is intact and still on my ceiling but I'm really afraid to use it at this point. It must've fallen really hard because the light smashed, the blades were smashed and my cat looked terrified. My understanding is these fans have a lifetime warranty and I'm hoping that Hunter lives up to this expectation. There's no way this could ever be put back together again.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great look- lighting- and cooling.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and it sure gets the job done! I had a much more ornate fixture previously, and though I wanted something simpler, I wasn’t sure. Well... this one looks better than the first, and with temps of 92, it has really made a huge difference! AND the light actually brightens the room! Previous fan’s light fixture was worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M Valcourt

customer_reviews.title: Very quite and works great
customer_reviews.text: Very quite. We don't run it on high because it seems to vibrate quite a bit more than on medium speed, but I'm pretty sure that is a balance issue that will be fixed once I use the included balance kit. The installation was pretty straight forward, however, the included backed that you screw into ceiling mount seemed to be a bit narrow for fitting onto the ceiling. The diameter of the hole in our ceiling was not much larger than the box in the ceiling, yet the bracket just barely overlapped the actual ceiling which seemed weird.
customer_reviews.author: Tyghe Vallard

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, QC issue
customer_reviews.text: Install was mostly easy, quiet fan thus far. Big issue at first that lost them 2 stars: the reverse doesn't work. I might have never discovered this as I almost never need to reverse a fan, but unfortunately it came set in reverse and didn't spin. After checking that all wires running in were correct and had power, I flipped the reverse switch for kicks and it started right up. Poor QC. I hope that doesn't translate into a fan that has more issues down the line.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: Very good fan indeed
customer_reviews.text: It works great but I do wish the dome was clear instead of giving that yellow look. Btw, the bulbs included are 2 incandescent candelabra bulbs, so if you want brighter and more energy efficient bulbs then I recommend buying LED bulbs. Also, I think I found a remote on Amazon that works with this but it needs to be wired up in the fan base itself, so if you want that, then you should install it when you install the fan to avoid he headache of having to disassemble and reassemble it later. Overall it is a great fan and very quiet 👍
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing air circulation ability
customer_reviews.text: Maybe if you are putting this fan in a very small room it would meet your needs. Probably good for a baby nursery as it is very quiet. The amount of air circulating from this fan is minuscule. You can barely feel it on high standing right under it. Low and medium are laughable. We have had it up for a year now and very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: Open the box and do not schedule the electrician unless the components are not damaged!
customer_reviews.text: Fan box was intact. However the glass dome was received pulverized. Problem is that the electrician was mounting the fan and the box was not damaged and opened by the electrician and found to contain the damaged glass dome. The fan was installed or the cost for the fan installation would have out-priced the fan cost. The fan was mounted, but the dome replacement was the cost of the consumer! $50 for a $129 fan!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Horribly unbalanced
customer_reviews.text: I’ve installed over 20 ceiling fans in my life (I move a lot) and this is the first time I’ve even had balance a fan with weights. This fan is so off balance all the weights in the lot can’t correct it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristofor E

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ceiling Fan!
customer_reviews.text: This ceiling fan has been in our home for a week now and we love it. It operates with absolute quiet efficiency and has no balance issues that usually cause a fan to wobble. The fan looks great in our bedroom ceiling!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Reader

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fan as you would expect from Hunter.
customer_reviews.text: This fan does not come with a remote control, but has room for a transmitter in the mounting base. You can buy any universal remote control and it works well. You do not need to buy the very expensive Hunter remote. I used one from Hampton Bay that worked out great!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Magazzu

customer_reviews.title: Almost prefect
customer_reviews.text: Like the hunter Watson it's almost perfect. Unlike the hunter Watson, this one buzzes and had some construction issues. The fan blades were coming delanimated out of the box. Super glue and ready to go. Admittedly not something you should have to do on a new fan. However also unlike the Watson this was balanced out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Smith

customer_reviews.title: This ceiling light lasted less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: The first one lasted two years, about, and I replaced the light kit in the unit December of 2019. It's now September of 2020, and the light kit is out again. This ceiling fan is not worth it. The fan itself is fine, but the light kits are complete garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Cattibrie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Ceiling Fan - Excellent Support from the Hunter Company
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent fan and it looks great. My ceilings are not super high - with the shortest mounting pole it works great and there is plenty of clearance. If your ceiling is not 100% level, you need this type of fan with a hanging pole - flush mounts WILL NOT install properly. I needed help with a part and the Hunter Company sent a new part immediately. Great customer service!!! I can recommend this product without any reservations.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mando

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fan arrived quickly and my husband installed it just as quick. The fan is quiet and moves a lot of air. I also got a remote control which makes this the best deal out there.
customer_reviews.author: itzKat

customer_reviews.title: Good fans, only minor annoyances.
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 of these fans, One in my living room, and just installed a 2nd in my office. I think they look great, and I love how quiet they run. My only 2 gripes are that I wish it had one higher speed to really move some air, and the 2 light bulbs just arent bright enough..
customer_reviews.author: C. Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Lights stop working, but fan continues to work
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in 2017, and the lights stopped working about a year later. Why? There are several reviews and videos on this. The fan's circuits have a safety switch that burns out, and then your lights do not work. There is NO replacement part to purchase. I do not recommend purchasing from Hunter in this series, read the reviews on how many have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Godo

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a (too quickly worn out) $500.00 fan with this builders fan. Looks almost as good and does the job just as well as the old broken expensive fan. Chain needed to be lengthened but aside from that, perfect. We control it on the wall switch. Easy. Very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Dugan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted for my Master Bedroom and to complement my new hardwood floors. There is no noise when operating and the remote control was an added bonus. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quiet fan
customer_reviews.text: Nice quiet fan. However - threaded holes in the arms where the blades attach were mostly defective which prevented the bolts from installing easily. Had to use pliers to turn the screws, essentially cutting new threads in the arm. Would only be a problem now if I ever wanted to disassemble it, which I don't see happening. Also would have been nice if the black wires from the fan were marked which one was for the fan and which one was for the light to make hooking it up to the dual wall switch wiring easier. I've installed many Hunter fans in my house and they have all been trouble free.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer Bob

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, quiet and moves some air!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced two old, very white (!) ceiling fans in our family room. What a difference! More light and more air moving in the room! Instead of remotes I simply purchased 2 sets of Hyamass 2pcs Vintage Hollow Out Charm Pendant Ceiling Fan Danglers Fan Pulls Chain Extender with Ball Chain Connector so that I could reach the pulls!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H Duff

customer_reviews.title: Heed the negative reviews! Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this based on the Hunter name and oh was that a bad move. Purchased in August 2018 and the fan has already stopped working so I didn’t even get years worth of usage.
customer_reviews.author: G's way

customer_reviews.title: A stylish, quiet fan, and very well built
customer_reviews.text: This replaces a 60" Hunter fan in our bedroom which had faulty electronics due to it being a remote controlled fan. The installation was a breeze due to using existing Hunter fans. I must say, this is the quietest fan I've EVER used in my life. It is very stylish and moves air very well in our bedroom. We plan to replace the lighting with a dimmer but the current lighting looks great behind the frosted glass. A very stylish fan which matches our bedroom furniture and appears very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Tech support is bad
customer_reviews.text: fan works OK, but came with broken bulbs. Called toll free number for Hunter to get replacement bulbs per the package instructions. After 5-10 minutes of hold was told Hunter no longer replaces broken bulbs. No credit, no nothing your are SOL-thanks for your purchase. fan is already installed so I have no choice but to buy more bulbs-Great customer service, NOT
customer_reviews.author: F. McClamrock

customer_reviews.title: Very good sale price for the fan and straight forward to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good sale price for the fan and straight forward to install. I purchased two and replaced the light dome with my older lights that I removed. It's too bad the fan only comes with a shaded globe which makes the light dimmer. I did replace the existing bulbs with 6 watts LED which helps with the existing lighting.....But this was personal choice depending on the lighting you desire....
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan, moves lots of air.
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in 2 different rooms - about an hour each. They look great and, more importantly, move a fair amount of air. Update - have been using it for a year or so everyday. I knocked 2 stars off the review primarily because the light is fairly useless. The bowl is dark and dims whatever bulb you stick in there. I placed 2 candelabra cfl bulbs that were 60w equivalents, and with the bowl in place, it's not enough light to read in the room. Tried higher output bulbs, but it tripped my surge protection. Looked into replacing the bowl with something clearer and found that most were at least $40.
customer_reviews.author: HTS

customer_reviews.title: This fan slowed done to nothing within a year and ...
customer_reviews.text: This fan slowed done to nothing within a year and now is stopped. My electrician told me Hunter is not what they used to be. Now I have to buy another fan
customer_reviews.author: Dje

customer_reviews.title: Fan makes lots of noise, DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this fan! I had to return the first fan within a few days as the motor sounds like something is loose in there. The replacement lasted one year and is now making the same noise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a beautiful fan
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for a large bedroom and we needed a light too. It was easy to instal and the fan is very quiet. We didn't get a remote control and I'm not sure if this model has that option. I would recommend this fan to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: All 3 speeds work fine in our 2 bedrooms and are quiet. Like the lowest speed at night when sleeping. Light is fine for the smallish bedrooms we have. The quiet of the fan motor is a plus and the air moved is just below the annoying threshold which would have made it a deal breaker. Nicely made and will see how it holds up. The price for this recommended fan is terrific and absolutely no complaints or remorse. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Willowisp

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The longest part of the installation was taking the old fan down which was up for 23 years. It was easy to follow instructions, looks Great and works Great, love the light! Highly recommend this product! Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Jacoby-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended - design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this fan. The light fixture is configured in such a way that it throws light up to the ceiling, as well as down. This creates a shadow of the fan against the ceiling, even when the fan is not operating. When the fan and light are on together, the "strobe" light effect is very strong. I have purchased other fans, where there is a coupling or some similar banding around the light, so that the light is directed 100% down or out. That is a better design which avoids this strobing.
customer_reviews.author: bbh

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan! Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I've never had a bad Hunter fan and this one is no exception. I have always found them to be very quiet and great work horses--they go & go & go! This one is very attractive and the lighting is nice. I did try several bulbs before finding the perfect warm light I was looking for. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: eatsleeprun

customer_reviews.title: Fan is fine
customer_reviews.text: But I really dislike the dark colored glass on the light. I tried to replace it but could not find anything that would fit and it doesn't match the rest of the light fixtures in the house.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperMJ

customer_reviews.title: Needs More Power
customer_reviews.text: The fan looks nice and is very quiet. But I'm disappointed it doesn't have more power to it, even on the highest setting. I live in a small apartment, and a more powerful fan would cool it off significantly. This one just sort of adds a nice breeze. Ditto the light. It adds a nice accent, but it doesn't really illuminate the room much.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J. Sank

customer_reviews.title: Product Defective with a defective sticker from factory
customer_reviews.text: Amazon sent me a defective Hunter fan. The box had a defective sticker from Hunter. I hired anelectrician to install product. You have made spent another hour with the electrician plus I have to wait for the new fan. It is costing me money. What are you going to do about it?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great way to keep your cool
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this fan. Our electrician replaced an earlier [very expensive] ceiling fan in our bedroom with this unit. The fan was paired with a Litex RCI-103 remote control assembly (also available from Amazon). The fan is the quietest running ceiling fan in the house with no audible hum or buzz. All in all we are very satisfied with the Hunter 53091 ceiling fan.
customer_reviews.author: Ray O

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy remote, but fan is very decent.
customer_reviews.text: It's just settin up there doing what it's supposed to do. Very quiet. The price forthe remote, $75 for a flimsy piece of light plastic is excessive, but it works Ok.
customer_reviews.author: carver

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan looks amazing in my home. This worked excellent and super powerful for about 6 months and now high setting feels more like light medium. I’m not mechanically inclined so I can’t tell you if it can be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: JustLikeMom

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, well made, excellent performing product! The picture does not do it justice; it exceeds my expectations. I have purchased Hunter ceiling fans before, so I should not be surprised. Lighting is just what I wanted; fan speeds are also. The warranty can't be beaten. The packaging was extremely well done. If you are looking at this, do not hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.author: SwampWitch

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality fan for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality fan for the buck. Fan is amazing, perfect in fact, but the lights are so dim... serious issue that should be pointed out. Barely even a mood light.. I bought some led replacement bulbs. Hope this works??
customer_reviews.author: Josiah J.

customer_reviews.title: Elegant lighting
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking style fan / light fixture for my day room. Has three speed fan and is pretty easy to install. Manual was not the easiest to understand, but then I'm not exactly a handy man around the house either. Uses the small decorative 40 watt bulbs. puts out fair light so don't expect real bright. When putting it together if your fan doesn't work, check the red wire in the plug that connects the light and fan together. It was not in the plug good but after shoving it in tight, no problems. works like a charm. It has a three speed fan with reverse.
customer_reviews.author: Calop

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, good buy (price-wise.) I would prefer that the colors on the fan blades have more of a color difference
customer_reviews.text: Great fan, good buy (price-wise.) I would prefer that the colors on the fan blades have more of a difference - both are a dark dark brown. If you are giving me two colors to choose from on a fan blade to help it to match my decor, they should not be almost identical. Our handyman could not even tell the difference from one side to the other. Excellent quality fan though, easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fan
customer_reviews.text: We replaced the 2 fans in our kids room. My husband had them installed within the hour. Great air movement and the perfect amount of light.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel and kirk

customer_reviews.title: REMOTE TOO LARGE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the fan and the remote that they recommended. The remote piece that is supposed to go into the fan housing will not fit, it's too large.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Baird

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN CHINA
customer_reviews.text: WELL CRUD NOW THE OLD SCHOOL HUNTER FANS OR AT LEAST THIS ONE IS MADE IN COMMUNIST CHINA BOOOOO
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Ultra quiet ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: Love this Hunter indoor ceiling fan. Very quiet and functions well. I plan to purchase several more to replace several others in the home.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L.

customer_reviews.title: Check your box
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 3 for our home, one glass cover was broken! But we ordered another one, so check your box,
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I now have several of these fans..........one in each bedroom.......they're quiet, balanced, and move just the right amount of air........for the price, can't beat them.
customer_reviews.author: J B

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This van is easy to install, very quiet, and has good airflow. The quality of a Hunter Douglas fan is always good.
customer_reviews.author: Deloris D.

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This fan is really easy to install and looks like it costs a lot more than the price here on Amazon. My wife couldn't believe how quiet it was. For those of you guys looking to impress your lady on how much you know about home improvement, this is the fan for you. Just don't get electrocuted be sure to hit the breaker before you start. Note this fan does not have a remote control. I found a nice remote control kit here on Amazon for about 24 bucks and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: raceboard

customer_reviews.title: attractive and quiet
customer_reviews.text: quality item with attractive expensive look. Fits well on the ceiling and works great. Minimum difficulty putting up.
customer_reviews.author: catflowerbear

customer_reviews.title: Hunter fans are my favorite
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these fans for two additional rooms. We were unable to find the exact ones we had purchased at Costco when we 1st moved in but I have to say these are very similar in style and look at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: FlyNBryan

customer_reviews.title: We love it! Got it for a great price during ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Got it for a great price during Black Friday sale! The hunter brand for ceiling fans is top notch. The workmanship and quality is superb. This is a beautiful ceiling fan. Very quiet motor when the fan is running. We love the soft glow From the light--it's just he right amount in our bedroom. Definitely going to order a Nother ceiling fan of this brand for our living room in a larger size. Totally pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lady P

customer_reviews.title: Good Fan
customer_reviews.text: I installed this fan yesterday. Fairly simple and quick install. I wired it to a single switch on the wall. It looks nice, runs well, moves a good amount of air, and is VERY quiet. Overall i am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah DiMaggio

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and balanced
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to install. The fans were balanced very nicely as they came and the included balance kits were not needed. The included LED lights are pretty bright and overall I'm very happy with these fans.
customer_reviews.author: Quiet

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fan April 2014. It's a good looking unit and was easy to install. The wiring and components are not built to last however. Two years and one month later, the lights stopped working. We installed several new bulbs and replaced the light kit to no avail. Warranty process and policies are so cumbersome that I bought a Westinghouse fan to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Oops
customer_reviews.text: Fan works great. I was searching for outdoor fan and this one came up so I got it and my installer told me it is an indoor fan. I will use til it no longer works and be more careful when I have to order a new one. I have Hunter fans in my house and they have worked great for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fans. These move the air quite well and are very nice looking. Not difficult at all to install. The manual warns you not to use CFL bulbs - not sure why. Anyways, the glass really yellows the light you get from it, so don't plan on brightening up a room with this fan. It doesn't put out much light, and it will warm the colors on your walls.
customer_reviews.author: John Seale

customer_reviews.title: Solid and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Like the style and product. Very happy with these fans. Installed 3
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: No clue
customer_reviews.text: I returned it. Never opened the box and only wrote this so it would stop asking me to rate the item
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fan.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fan. Very quiet with nice clean lines. Looks even better than the one we replaced. We are very happy with it. It arrived on time, with all necessary parts and instructions and was available much sooner than if we had ordered the same fan (which was not in stock) at our local home improvements stores.
customer_reviews.author: Chopper Chic

customer_reviews.title: Quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Only had them up (bought two) for a month now but they have been running non stop. Super quiet and extremely pleased with these fans! Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rene Smith

customer_reviews.title: Its Okay.
customer_reviews.text: Decent Fan, seems mid range quality. Expected a bit better quality from Hunter in this price point. It works fine. Motor wasn't very heavy. The light takes the smaller CAndelabra bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: JayD

customer_reviews.title: There was a lot of extra wire available so could have added a good length of pipe to lower the height
customer_reviews.text: Fan is attractive, quiet, and seems well built for the price. I changed out the incandescent lamps for CFLs. No problem with flicker. Ours is mounted at nearly 14 feet in an A-frame cabin but still moves air quite well. There was a lot of extra wire available so could have added a good length of pipe to lower the height, but I opted not to due to time constraints of getting the job done and that may have lent itself to vibration problems. As it is, it didn't even require blade balancing. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Yanney

customer_reviews.title: Works well and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Very good fan. Looks nice and works well. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Bock

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fan for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for a similar Hunter fan that we loved but the motor died. The truth is we use this fan 8 months out of the year almost continually so it's no wonder the motor crapped out after 5 years! This price for this fan and light kit were less than just the fan alone so I jumped all over it! I love Hunter fans - quiet and last a long time. I expect this one will, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Morales Ward

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase this again and/or recommend it to a friend
customer_reviews.text: I quite like the appearance of this unit. The installation went smoothly along with the Hunter universal remote I received as a gift. For my purposes I used the supplied shorter downrod, and the remote receiver fit fine under the hanging bracket under the canopy cover without a lot of effort. The blades required no balancing having been tested in both directions at all three speeds. They DO in fact have two different patterns on the two sides, though they are so similar in color that it is virtually indistinguishable after installation -- the grain is the primary differentiator and thus scarcely noticeable. It would be an improvement if there were one side with a distinctly different shade.
customer_reviews.author: T. Yamada

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking fan
customer_reviews.text: I installed it to replace a twenty year old fan in my bedroom. Looks great and works like a charm. It comes with balancing weights and instructions on how to use them. After a slight wobble, I was able to get a perfect balance. Took about 2 hours to assemble/install. And this was my first go at replacing a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: A really great ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: A really great ceiling fan! Easy to set up, it took me about two hours to remove the old lamp and have this running. It is literally silent on low speed. It looks great. The only problem is the lights are old fashioned candelabra style lights... like Christmas bulbs. I am going to see if I can find a replacement. If I cant the fan can be set up without the lights. In any event It is great fan! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Quality, quiet fan
customer_reviews.text: Very good product that was easy to install. Consistent with the Hunter line of products.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel D. Arellano

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We bought two. Unfortunately one of the glass domes and the some of the fan blades got messed up. I guess during shipping. But I just contacted the information from Hunter and they sent us replacements. I like the lighting and color.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice fans for the price. Missing a few extras like remote control capability, but if you're looking for a nice basic fan, this is great. We used a 6 foot extension rod and the fans are still run smooth without wobbling. The light kit is simple and the design is sleek. Many other styles were too Tuscan or baroque for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: CabushkaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan was placed on the ceiling in the living room. It is serving its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Lambert Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Poor Light Kit
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan, easy to install, however, the light kit is useless. It only has two sockets the size of Christmas lights. I sent the other two fans back after installing one.
customer_reviews.author: Paul F.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS FAN!
customer_reviews.text: Finally replaced a 20 year old fan with this one and wish I would have done it sooner! Get so many compliments on how beautiful this fan looks in my dining room. Great product! HIghly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Animal lover

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied for the price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Good fan. Had a apart missing that the company promptly sent me. Had it professionally installed but there is a slight noise not common with fans when it is on. Not bad enough that I need to replace but still. Also, check what size you want. This is the 52 inch. I have a mild size master room and wish I would have spent more for the 60 inch
customer_reviews.author: Zyb

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't move air
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a 35 pound, 50 year old Hunter fan with this. It hardly moves any air, and that's on the high speed. It's almost flush with the ceiling. I'll have to install a down rod to feel any effect.
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Best ceiling fan we've bought. It is very quiet and easy to install. Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very well constructed and easy to assemble ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well constructed and easy to assemble ceiling fan. The instructions are well written but hardly necessary to install fan. It was perfectly balanced out of the box. Should work for years of service.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Milewski

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Fan!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan to replace a fan in our bedroom. It arrived quickly in perfect condition. It is nice looking and is high quality, typical of Hunter products. Installation was easy and it works perfectly. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbqme2

customer_reviews.title: Hunter fans last forever!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan, so quiet even on the highest speed!! Easy to install, took my brother about an hour. Of course I help put the blades together. Light works great for my bedroom. Replaced another Hunter that I put there when I built the house 20 years ago!! Replaced because I add hard wood floors and wanted to change the fan color from white to wood grain.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Rosa

product_meta.title: Hunter Fan Company Hunter 53091 Transitional 52``Ceiling Fan from Builder Deluxe collection Dark finish, New Bronze
product_meta.description: Size:52"| Color:New BronzeThe Builder Deluxe traditional indoor ceiling fan is an updated classic design that will freshen up any of your small rooms, from kitchens to bedrooms. The LED light glass bowl ceiling fan has fully-dimmable, high-efficient LED bulbs that give you total control over your lighting. 13-degree blade pitch optimized to ensure ideal air movement and peak performance. This adjustable mount fan comes with a three-position mounting system that allows for standard, low, or angled mounting. 3 Inch and 2 Inch downrods of the fan ensures proper distance from the ceiling and optimize air movement at your preferred blade height. This reversible fan comes with reverse rotation fan blades that keep the rooms in and out of your home feeling cool during summers and warm during winters.
feature_bullets: CLASSIC CEILING FAN: The traditional Builder Deluxe fan comes with LED light covered by toffee glass that will keep home interior inspired; Measures 52 x 52 x 17.77 Inch
MULTI-SPEED REVERSIBLE FAN MOTOR: Whisper Wind delivers ultra-powerful airflow fan with quiet performance; Change the direction from downdraft mode during the summer to updraft mode during the winter
LED BOWL LIGHT KIT: Energy-efficient dimmable LED light bulbs let you control the lighting and ambiance of the living space; The long lasting bulbs have longer lifespan than traditional bulbs
PULL CHAIN CONTROL: Turn the bronze ceiling fan on/off and adjust the speed quickly and easily with the pull chain

ROOM PLACEMENT: Indoor fan is height adjustable, via the included 2" & 3" downrods, to ensure proper distance from the ceiling and optimize air movement; Ideal fan for living room, lounge, and bedrooms

specifications.Included Components: Pull Chain, Hunter 53091 Builder Deluxe 5-Blade Single Light Ceiling Fan
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,755 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
